explanation: [0-0] In a beige room, there is a TV. On the TV screen, a young woman is applying lipstick. Behind her, there are many cosmetics and bags on a shelf.

[0-4] At this moment, a man wearing blue and white clothes appears from the left side. He glances at the woman applying lipstick on TV, points at her with his finger, then looks at the camera while mimicking the lipstick application on his lips. Afterwards, he glances at the TV again and turns to the camera, nodding his head.
